ProjectTitle: Predicting the long-term effects of iron addition on phosphorus dynamics in streams using modelling and high-resolution in-situ techniques.
InitialFeedbackHistory: 04/04/2024 [REDACTED] please also add the samples/materials that you will use, these are physical data in the context of a DMP, how will you document, store, preserve and/or share those? [REDACTED] please note that the KU [REDACTED] RDM policy asks for 10 years of preservation of all relevant data: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy. [REDACTED] is not suitable for long term preservation, this is linked to your account and expires when you leave KU [REDACTED] make sure to transfer your data to your supervisor before you leave. [REDACTED] will all your data be available in the publication? [REDACTED] may be easier to share your data in a repository such as KU [REDACTED] RDR where you also get a DOI so you can link it in your publication and add it to your cv. [REDACTED] publishing data it's best to add a license so others know how to reuse your data, eg cc-by meaning others can freely reuse it but they have to acknowledge/cite you. [REDACTED] more information see: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing and www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
